701493f-a.title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Paulding Avenue
701493f-a.text:
Morris Park Ave., west from Paulding Ave., showing the thoroughfare
under construction, through the property of the former Morris Park Race
Track. That part of the avenue which extends from Williamsbridge Road to
Bronxdale Ave., part of which is here shown, was laid out early in 1913
prior to the sale of the track property to the general public by Joseph
P. Day and J. Clarence Davies in June of the same year. For additional
data see the New York Times of April 27, June 15, and June 22, 1913.
Spring 1913.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
